p: Fresh samples were ground to a size of 30 mm using a shredder (90 kW, slow rotating single-shaft type, 70 r.p.m., SILMISA, Onil, Spain), just before distillation. Subsamples were taken to determine the moisture content in an oven at 105 Â°C until they reached a constant weight, following the standard ISO 18134-2:2017 [ 92].
